Claim #1: "Competitors argue that their solutions offer better performance and efficiency, often highlighting superior performance metrics and resource utilization."

Pure's Advantage: Portworx offers superior performance even with the same high availability (repl=3) as other solutions. It also provides improvements with container granular replication settings and I/O profiles. Portworx is designed to distribute work over many parallel processes, increasing speed and efficiency.
